Card.Name: Siren Stormtamer
Card.RulesText: Flying {U}, Sacrifice Siren Stormtamer: Counter target spell or ability that targets you or a creature you control.

Card.Name: Blight Keeper
Card.RulesText: Flying {7}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Blight Keeper: Target opponent loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.

Card.Name: Storm fleet Aerialist
Card.RulesText: Flying Raid — Storm Fleet Aerialist enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.

Card.Name: Ruin Raider
Card.RulesText: Raid — At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to the card's mana value.

Card.Name: Kitesail Freebooter
Card.RulesText: Flying When Kitesail Freebooter enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. Exile that card until Kitesail Freebooter leaves the battlefield.

Card.Name: Favorable Winds
Card.RulesText: Creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.

Card.Name: Lightning Strike
Card.RulesText: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.

Card.Name: Chart a Course
Card.RulesText: Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless you attacked this turn.

Card.Name: Fiery Cannonade
Card.RulesText: Fiery Cannonade deals 2 damage to each non-Pirate creature.

Card.Name: Evolving Wilds
Card.RulesText: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Drowned Catacomb
Card.RulesText: Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.
